member.name: T:WorkDays.Client.Models.WorkDayDto
member.summary: Represents a workday with details such as date, working hours, break duration, and type of day.
member.remarks: This data transfer object (DTO) is used to encapsulate information about a single workday, including its unique identifier, start and end times, break duration, and whether it is a holiday. It also includes the total hours worked and the type of day (e.g., regular, holiday, etc.).

member.name: P:WorkDays.Client.Models.WorkDayDto.WorkDayId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the workday.

member.name: P:WorkDays.Client.Models.WorkDayDto.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date associated with this instance.

member.name: P:WorkDays.Client.Models.WorkDayDto.StartTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the start time of the event.

member.name: P:WorkDays.Client.Models.WorkDayDto.EndTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the end time of the event or operation.

member.name: P:WorkDays.Client.Models.WorkDayDto.Break
member.summary: Gets or sets the time at which the break occurs.

member.name: P:WorkDays.Client.Models.WorkDayDto.IsHoliday
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current date is a holiday.

member.name: P:WorkDays.Client.Models.WorkDayDto.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of day represented by this instance.

member.name: P:WorkDays.Client.Models.WorkDayDto.TotalHours
member.summary: Gets or sets the total hours represented as a value.

member.name: T:WorkDays.Client.Resource
member.summary: Android Resource Designer class. Exposes the Android Resource designer assembly into the project Namespace.
